General.Name: Healthcare AI Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Healthcare AI Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends on healthcare and pharmaceutical companies in the e-clinical, healthcare information technology, or outsourced pharmaceutical services industries. Healthcare AI Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: 190 Elgin Avenue, George Town, Cayman Islands, 10177
